languages.text: "Что ж. Раз с этим... недоразумением покончено, я бы хотела сменить тему. Признайте, будет честно, если и я задам вам несколько вопросов, так ведь?" {n}Кассия чуть медлит и продолжает менее уверенным тоном.{/n} "Не подумайте — я не собираюсь вас ни в чем обвинять! Просто... вы самый достойный собеседник на корабле. И вы все время заняты..."

traits.locale_text: "Что ж. Раз с этим... недоразумением покончено, я бы хотела сменить тему. Признайте, будет честно, если и я задам вам несколько вопросов, так ведь?" {n}Кассия чуть медлит и продолжает менее уверенным тоном.{/n} "Не подумайте — я не собираюсь вас ни в чем обвинять! Просто... вы самый достойный собеседник на корабле. И вы все время заняты..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Very well. Since we are done with this... misunderstanding, I would like to change the subject. It would only be fair for me to ask you a few questions now, wouldn't it?" {n}Cassia hesitates and continues in a less confident tone.{/n} "Do not mistake me, I am not going to accuse you of anything! It's just that... you are the most worthy interlocutor on the entire ship. And you are always so busy..."

Признайте, будет честно, если и я задам вам несколько вопросов, так ведь?" {n}Кассия чуть медлит и продолжает менее уверенным тоном.{/n} "Не подумайте — я не собираюсь вас ни в чем обвинять! Просто... вы самый достойный собеседник на корабле. И вы все время заняты..."

traits.locale_text: "Very well. Since we are done with this... misunderstanding, I would like to change the subject. It will be fair if I ask you a few questions now, will it not?" {n}Cassia hesitates and continues in a less confident tone.{/n} "Do not get me wrong, I am not going to accuse you of anything! It is just... You are the most worthy interlocutor on the entire ship. And you are so busy all the time..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Very well. Since we are done with this... misunderstanding, I would like to change the subject. traits.locale_text: "Very well. Since we are done with this... misunderstanding, I would like to change the subject. It would only be fair for me to ask you a few questions now, wouldn't it?" {n}Cassia hesitates and continues in a less confident tone.{/n} "Do not mistake me, I am not going to accuse you of anything! It's just that... you are the most worthy interlocutor on the entire ship. And you are always so busy..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “很好，既然我们已经解开了这场……误解，我希望能换个话题。我觉得我应该问你几个问题，这样才算公平，你说呢？”{n}卡西娅犹豫了一下，以更加缺乏自信的语气开了口。{/n}“不要误会我的意思，我并不是打算指责你什么！只是……你是这艘船上最值得交谈的对象，而且你又总是这么忙……”
languages.original_text: "Very well. Since we are done with this... misunderstanding, I would like to change the subject. It would only be fair for me to ask you a few questions now, wouldn't it?" {n}Cassia hesitates and continues in a less confident tone.{/n} "Do not mistake me, I am not going to accuse you of anything! It's just that... you are the most worthy interlocutor on the entire ship. And you are always so busy..."

traits.locale_text: “很好，既然我们已经解开了这场……误解，我希望能换个话题。我觉得我应该问你几个问题，这样才算公平，你说呢？”{n}卡西娅犹豫了一下，以更加缺乏自信的语气开了口。{/n}“不要误会我的意思，我并不是打算指责你什么！只是……你是这艘船上最值得交谈的对象，而且你又总是这么忙……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Muy bien. Ahora que hemos resuelto este... malentendido, me gustaría cambiar de tema. Lo justo sería que también conteste a algunas de mis preguntas, ¿no?». {n}Cassia titubea y sigue, en tono menos confiado.{/n} «No me malinterprete, ¡no pretendo acusarle de nada! Es solo que... no hay otro interlocutor de su talla en la nave. Y siempre tiene algo que hacer...».
languages.original_text: "Very well. Since we are done with this... misunderstanding, I would like to change the subject. It would only be fair for me to ask you a few questions now, wouldn't it?" {n}Cassia hesitates and continues in a less confident tone.{/n} "Do not mistake me, I am not going to accuse you of anything! It's just that... you are the most worthy interlocutor on the entire ship. And you are always so busy..."

traits.locale_text: «Muy bien. Ahora que hemos resuelto este... malentendido, me gustaría cambiar de tema. Lo justo sería que también conteste a algunas de mis preguntas, ¿no?». {n}Cassia titubea y sigue, en tono menos confiado.{/n} «No me malinterprete, ¡no pretendo acusarle de nada! Es solo que... no hay otro interlocutor de su talla en la nave. Y siempre tiene algo que hacer...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「構いません。誤解は解けましたので…話題を変えましょう。ならば、{name}様にいくつかご質問しても構わないでしょうか？」{n}カシアはためらい、自信なさげに続ける。{/n}「誤解しないでください、あたくしは{name}様を非難するつもりはありません！ただ…{name}様はこの船で最も価値のある対話者ですので。それに、いつもお忙しそうですから…」
languages.original_text: "Very well. Since we are done with this... misunderstanding, I would like to change the subject. It would only be fair for me to ask you a few questions now, wouldn't it?" {n}Cassia hesitates and continues in a less confident tone.{/n} "Do not mistake me, I am not going to accuse you of anything! It's just that... you are the most worthy interlocutor on the entire ship. And you are always so busy..."

traits.locale_text: 「構いません。誤解は解けましたので…話題を変えましょう。ならば、{name}様にいくつかご質問しても構わないでしょうか？」{n}カシアはためらい、自信なさげに続ける。{/n}「誤解しないでください、あたくしは{name}様を非難するつもりはありません！ただ…{name}様はこの船で最も価値のある対話者ですので。それに、いつもお忙しそうですから…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "In Ordnung. Da dieses ... Missverständnis nun ausgeräumt ist, würde ich gerne das Thema wechseln. Es wäre doch nur gerecht, wenn ich Euch auch einige Fragen stelle, oder nicht?" {n}Cassia zögert und fährt etwas weniger selbstsicher fort:{/n} "Versteht mich nicht falsch, ich werde Euch nichts vorwerfen. Aber ihr seid nun mal {mf|der würdigste Gesprächspartner|die würdigste Gesprächspartnerin} auf dem ganzen Schiff. Und Ihr seid immer so beschäftigt ..."
languages.original_text: "Very well. Since we are done with this... misunderstanding, I would like to change the subject. It would only be fair for me to ask you a few questions now, wouldn't it?" {n}Cassia hesitates and continues in a less confident tone.{/n} "Do not mistake me, I am not going to accuse you of anything! It's just that... you are the most worthy interlocutor on the entire ship. And you are always so busy..."

traits.locale_text: "In Ordnung. Da dieses ... Missverständnis nun ausgeräumt ist, würde ich gerne das Thema wechseln. Es wäre doch nur gerecht, wenn ich Euch auch einige Fragen stelle, oder nicht?" {n}Cassia zögert und fährt etwas weniger selbstsicher fort:{/n} "Versteht mich nicht falsch, ich werde Euch nichts vorwerfen. Aber ihr seid nun mal {mf|der würdigste Gesprächspartner|die würdigste Gesprächspartnerin} auf dem ganzen Schiff. Und Ihr seid immer so beschäftigt ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Très bien. Puisque ce... malentendu est dissipé, changeons de sujet. J'estime qu'il ne serait que justice que je puisse vous poser quelques questions à mon tour. » {n}Cassia hésite un instant avant de poursuivre sur un ton bien moins péremptoire.{/n} « Ne vous méprenez pas, je n'ai aucune intention de vous accuser de quoi que ce soit ! Le fait est que vous êtes {mf|le seul interlocuteur|la seule interlocutrice} digne de ce nom sur ce vaisseau, mais vous êtes constamment {mf|occupé|occupée}, alors... »
languages.original_text: "Very well. Since we are done with this... misunderstanding, I would like to change the subject. It would only be fair for me to ask you a few questions now, wouldn't it?" {n}Cassia hesitates and continues in a less confident tone.{/n} "Do not mistake me, I am not going to accuse you of anything! It's just that... you are the most worthy interlocutor on the entire ship. And you are always so busy..."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien. Puisque ce... malentendu est dissipé, changeons de sujet. J'estime qu'il ne serait que justice que je puisse vous poser quelques questions à mon tour. » {n}Cassia hésite un instant avant de poursuivre sur un ton bien moins péremptoire.{/n} « Ne vous méprenez pas, je n'ai aucune intention de vous accuser de quoi que ce soit ! Le fait est que vous êtes {mf|le seul interlocuteur|la seule interlocutrice} digne de ce nom sur ce vaisseau, mais vous êtes constamment {mf|occupé|occupée}, alors... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Pekâlâ. Madem bu yanlış anlamayı arkamızda bıraktık, konuyu değiştirmek istiyorum. Benim de sana birkaç soru sormamın mahsuru olmaz herhâlde, değil mi?" {n}Cassia, tereddüt edip kendinden pek de emin olmayan bir tavırla devam ediyor.{/n} "Beni yanlış anlama, seni bir şeyle suçlayacak falan değilim! Sadece gemideki en karşılıklı konuşmaya değer muhatabım sensin ve sürekli meşgulsün."
languages.original_text: "Very well. Since we are done with this... misunderstanding, I would like to change the subject. It would only be fair for me to ask you a few questions now, wouldn't it?" {n}Cassia hesitates and continues in a less confident tone.{/n} "Do not mistake me, I am not going to accuse you of anything! It's just that... you are the most worthy interlocutor on the entire ship. And you are always so busy..."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ. Madem bu yanlış anlamayı arkamızda bıraktık, konuyu değiştirmek istiyorum. Benim de sana birkaç soru sormamın mahsuru olmaz herhâlde, değil mi?" {n}Cassia tereddüt ediyor ve daha az kendine güvenir bir tavırla devam ediyor:{/n} "Beni yanlış anlama, seni bir şeyle suçlayacak falan değilim! Sadece gemideki en karşılıklı konuşmaya değer muhatabım sensin ve sürekli meşgulsün."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
